item.description:
"Quality Plus Distinction” was the slogan created by Liberato and Guiseppina Dell’Amura when they opened Libby's Italian Bakery eighty-five years ago. "Fair-trade Coffees - Expertly Roasted, Perfectly Blended" is the tag line for One World Roasters, a new specialty coffee roastery here in New Haven.

Put these two together and you have a Coffee & Cookie Tasting at Libby's North Haven bakery & cafe. We will sample Columbian El Toro coffee, freshly ground & brewed, along with the most delicious Italian cookies on the east coast.

Colombian coffee is widely known as one of the world's best coffees. This Colombia Supremo "El Toro" is exactly such a coffee with a full aroma, medium body, and good acidity. Its pleasing fruit tones are balanced by an excellent caramel-like sweetness, and an overall "richness" that has made Colombian coffees famous.

All of Libby's cookies are baked fresh daily and their famous sugar cookies are hand-decorated with the utmost care and attention to detail. Only the freshest, tastiest cookies possible are sold here with many kinds of biscotti too numerous too mention.

The coffee will be brewed using a Chemex, which is a slow pour-over method of brewing. It is as amazing to watch as it is to taste! Pour-over brewing methods produce a truly better cup of coffee.
item.name: Coffee & Cookie Tasting
